pullRequest.title: Add Remote Config Integration tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add Remote Config Integration tests

Note: Added release:stage to trigger integration tests
Related to: #446

nodes.bodyText: I'd suggest using the sync APIs here like the previous test case.

Nit: Some of these can be split into separate test case with a bit of effort and extra RPCs (I'll leave it to you to decide whether that's worth it)

validate can be easily turned into a separate test case
getAtVersion and rollback can also be made into separate test cases if we are willing to run a few extra get and publish operations.

commit.message: Updated listversions tests to use the sync apis
